long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An official extension from the Routs team is needed to interact with multi-wallets in crypto. 

Using the extension, you can import a bunch of wallets, connect them to the Routs platform, and sign all the proposed transactions with just one click. 

The extension only works with app.routs.io and has open-source code, and can be reviewed on Github: https://github.com/routs-io/routs-extension
